abstract: Philippe and Nicolas de Villiers, successful French operators of historical theme parks, are planning new operation in Crimea; pair will avoid troubled episodes in region's recent history, instead choosing to portray its Byzantine lineage from the distant past; have struck deal with Russian investors and have met with Russian Pres Vladimir Putin.
lead_paragraph: As the French operators of a popular historical theme park look to expand into Crimea, one question is, whose version of history will the park depict?

headline.main: Proposal for a Theme Park Draws From Crimea’s Distant Past

snippet: As the French operators of a popular historical theme park look to expand into Crimea, one question is, whose version of history will the park depict?
